purpleculture_pinyin:
rǎng
to blurt out; to shout
выпалить; кричать
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 襄 indicates the sound; 口 (mouth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
叫嚷 [ jiào rǎng ]: to shout; to bellow one's grievances
吵嚷 [ chǎo rǎng ]: to make a racket; clamour; uproar
吵吵嚷嚷 [ chǎo chǎo rǎng rǎng ]: to make an (unnecessary) racket (idiom)
嚷劈 [ rǎng pī ]: shout oneself hoarse
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 口 [ kǒu ] mouth; entrance, gate, opening
    • 襄 [ xiāng ] to aid, to help, to assist; to undress
heisig_chinese_memo: The pigeons in the pigeon coop get sick of being stuck in there and start to cry out with their little mouths for help.
Ru_trainchinese:
rǎng: (глаг) кричать, орать; (разг.) шуметь; (диал.) ругаться
rāng: (глаг) кричать, орать (используется только в 嚷嚷)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The pigeons in the pigeon coop get sick of being stuck in there and start to cry out with their little mouths for help.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " mouth ", " xiang " sound. The original meaning is to shout loudly. For example, Shi Naian's "Water Margin" Chapter 92: "Shi Qian insisted on torches, and ran to the south with Shi Xiu, shouting at the Marshal." Qing Dynasty Cao Xueqin's "Dream of the Red Chamber" Chapter 25: "(Baoyu ) Straighten the body, jump three or four feet high off the ground, yelling in the mouth, and talking nonsense."

" Shout " also means noisy. For example, Qi Jiguang of the Ming Dynasty "New Book of Ji Xiao. Camping and Camping Military Order Prohibition": "The first silence is the main thing. Anyone who is usually noisy should be strapped for forty consecutive sittings." Qing Dynasty Wu Jingzi's "The Scholars" Chapter 45: "Two brothers, come to Ling's house, one Entering the door, I heard a loud noise inside."
humanum_short_description_en: From " mouth ", " xiang " sound. The original meaning is to shout loudly.
humanum_full_description:
從「口」，「襄」聲。本義是大聲喊叫。如元代施耐庵《水滸全傳》第92回：「時遷執著火把，同石秀一徑望南跑去，口裏嚷著報元帥。」清代曹雪芹《紅樓夢》第25回：「（寶玉）將身一縱，離地跳有三四尺高，口內亂嚷亂叫，說起胡話來了。」

　　「嚷」也表示吵鬧。如明代戚繼光《紀效新書．行營野營軍令禁約》：「第一肅靜為主，凡有平時喧嚷者，綑打四十連坐。」清代吳敬梓《儒林外史》第45回：「弟兄兩個，來到凌家，一進了門，聽得裏面一片聲吵嚷。」
humanum_short_description: 從「口」，「襄」聲。本義是大聲喊叫。

從「 口 」，「 襄 」聲。本義是大聲喊叫。如元代施耐庵《水滸全傳》第92回：「時遷執著火把，同石秀一徑望南跑去，口裏嚷著報元帥。」清代曹雪芹《紅樓夢》第25回：「（寶玉）將身一縱，離地跳有三四尺高，口內亂嚷亂叫，說起胡話來了。」 「 嚷 」也表示吵鬧。如明代戚繼光《紀效新書．行營野營軍令禁約》：「第一肅靜為主，凡有平時喧嚷者，綑打四十連坐。」清代吳敬梓《儒林外史》第45回：「弟兄兩個，來到凌家，一進了門，聽得裏面一片聲吵嚷。」
From " mouth", " xiang" sound. The original meaning is to shout loudly. For example, Shi Naian's "Water Margin" Chapter 92: "Shi Qian insisted on torches, and ran to the south with Shi Xiu, shouting at the Marshal." Qing Dynasty Cao Xueqin's "Dream of the Red Chamber" Chapter 25: "(Baoyu ) Straighten the body, jump three or four feet high off the ground, yelling in the mouth, and talking nonsense." " Shout" also means noisy. For example, Qi Jiguang of the Ming Dynasty "New Book of Ji Xiao. Camping and Camping Military Order Prohibition": "The first silence is the main thing. Anyone who is usually noisy should be strapped for forty consecutive sittings." Qing Dynasty Wu Jingzi's "The Scholars" Chapter 45: "Two brothers, come to Ling's house, one Entering the door, I heard a loud noise inside."

嚷字的基本解释

嚷
rǎng
喊叫：叫嚷。大叫大嚷。
吵闹：大吵大嚷。

嚷
rāng
〔嚷嚷〕a.叫嚷；吵闹，如“别人在午休，别大声嚷嚷。”b.声张，传扬，如“这事儿别嚷嚷出去让人知道”。

嚷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rǎng］［rāng］
(1)吵闹。
(2)叫喊。
(3)指喊叫声。
(4)杂乱。
(5)责备。

Кричать
Зная слово.
Изо рта его изображение похоже на открытый рот, что означает, что рот открыт; от сян (xiang), сян имеет высокое значение, что означает, что голос изо рта должен быть громким.
Первоначальное значение - громко кричать.
Оранж кричит; шумно: кричит ~ | шумно ~ "шумно ~. Орангутан [嚷嚷]"
①Шумный; шумный: Не ~, пациент спит.
2 Чжан: Не рассказывай об этом.
